reviewText: Harrison Ford and Clint Eastwood together on one disc.  It doesn't get any better than this.  In Air Force One, Ford plays the current U.S. President and former fighter jock.  He is aboard Air Force One when it is taken over by terrorists.  Ford comes to the rescue and saves the day of course.  This is a very good action film and sure to keep one on the edge of one's seat.  In the second film, In The Line of Fire, Eastwood plays a burned out Secret Services agent who once again gets the opportunity to save the president.  John Malchovich does his usual excellent job as the villain in this film.  Again, this film is sure to keep viewers on the edge of their seat.  These are two excellent action films starring two legendary movie heroes that are more than worth the price.
summary: Two Major Studs in Two Excellent Films.
Title: Air Force One / In the Line of Fire

reviewText: I liked Air Force One but have never seen In The Line of Fire so can't comment on that one. This is a gift for one of my dils but she is. Harrison Ford fan so Im sure she will be happy.
Title: Air Force One / In the Line of Fire

reviewText: Great action films with all star cast and just satisfying to watch.  Harrison Ford and Clint Eastwood are terrific and fun to watch.  Supporting cast in both films complement the main stars.  Well worth the money.
Title: Air Force One / In the Line of Fire

reviewText: both. They are excellent movies. Suggest the for everyone. Not somethingto miss. Get it, watch it. You'll love them!
Title: Air Force One / In the Line of Fire

reviewText: Two great movies for the price of one.  Actually much less than one.  The price was certainly a bargain and I got to watch two of my favorite actors, Ford and Eastwood.
Title: Air Force One / In the Line of Fire

reviewText: We like classic action. Harrison Ford played some pretty class action adventure roles, so these were movies we wanted on hand.
Title: Air Force One / In the Line of Fire
